remarks: The zero scalar of the dual of a vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Dec-2014.)
statement:
ldual0.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
ldual0.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
ldual0.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
ldual0.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` D ) $.
ldual0.o $e |- O = ( 0g ` S ) $.
ldual0.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
ldual0 $p |- ( ph -> O = .0. ) $.
